topic.title: Discuss (U5): Glaciers
topic.text:
Whoa! Glaciers are pretty awesome! The majority of the Upper Midwest region of the United States was formed by the last glacial cycle.

  • Describe the evidence and characteristics of glaciation that exists in this area or somewhere you have lived. Tell us what you have observed directly.

With the melting of existing glaciers,

  • Describe the dangers that are associated with this for oceans, and fresh water resources.
  • Also, feel free to comment on other effects that recent melting of glaciers has had on areas of the U.S. (e.g. Glacier National Park, Denali National Park, etc.).

Initial posts are due on Wednesday by 11:59 pm, in which you use full sentences and proper grammar.

Respond to at least two other students' post (at a minimum), which are due on Sunday by 11:59 pm.

  • Be sure to respond to other students' posts with a substantive comment using full sentences and proper grammar.
